ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker

Class ExpenseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.ExpenseController

  • public class ExpenseController
extends java.lang.Object
    When supplied with an expense the controller allows you to edit expense information (expense should not be edited directly).
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      ExpenseController needs the expense it is to edit as a paramter.
